content.div:
As Dan and Blair are finally ready to make "Dair" official, life in the Upper East Side seems to be settling down. Or is it?

In the just released clip below, executive producer Josh Safran and co-producer Jake Coburn give us the goods on what they promise will be a pivotal episode for the Gossip gang.

"A lot of really big secrets are going to come out," a giddy Coburn promises, adding that the episode, titled "A Princess' Dowry," will be about "what drives people to do very secretive things."

The CW also released a minute-long clip from the episode, set to air Monday at 9 p.m. on MuchMusic, which reveals that Blair's step-dad may have found a loophole in the Princess' pre-nup .

Watch both clips:

Producer preview

entry.title: Blake Lively and Mom Slap Alleged Stalker With Restraining Order

link.Abstract: Blake Lively and her mother Elaine have obtained a temporary restraining order against a man alleged to have followed the Gossip Girl star on set.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Gossip Girl star Blake Lively and her mother, Elaine Lively. The actress obtained a temporary restraining order against a man named Sergei Mifle. According to court docs, Mifle is alleged to have left several threatening messages with Elaine, begging to see Blake.
link.title: Blake Lively and her Mother, Elaine Lively

link.Abstract: From her rise to fame on Gossip Girl to her new gig as a Chanel ambassador, Blake Lively has always been on the fashion forefront. Here are some of her best (and worst) looks over the years.
link.title: Photos: Blake Lively's Fashion

link.Abstract: The Modern Family beauty has topped Askmen's 11th annual "Top 99 Most Deirable Women" list.
link.title: Sofia Vergara Voted the Most Desirable Woman of the Year

link.Abstract: Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds were spotted getting cozy in Vancouver yesterday.
link.title: Are Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds Going to Celebrate a Canadian Christmas?

link.Abstract: Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively were reportedly spotted apartment hunting in New York City.
link.title: Are Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds Apartment Hunting in NYC?

link.Abstract: Despite reports of a split, Leonardo DiCaprio and Blake Lively are still going strong.
link.title: Leonardo DiCaprio and Blake Lively's Hearts Go On...and On

link.Abstract: To emulate Blake’s style we’ve chosen a dress with a bit more coverage, but we didn’t hold back on the bling.

link.Abstract: In Green Lantern, she plays a superhero's girlfriend - with a twist.
